name: Inner (DarkStone Digital)
description:
WHY ARE YOU RUNNING?
Everyone has something in their past but few choose to face the things that scare them. Wander your subconscious mind under hypnosis and rummage through your memories. Maybe you will find what you're looking for.

THE HALLS OF THE MIND
Investiage your memories.


FIND THE ANSWERS
Connect the pieces.


ESCAPE YOUR FEARS
Outrun what's haunting you.


Thank you for the support! It was a lot of fun to make and I feel like something fun, interesting, and special was created in this short time. I hope you enjoy it!


Inner supports full xbox controller usage as well as keyboard & mouse.
